<karajan name="scheduler"> <include file="sys.xml"/> <include file="task.xml"/>
<scheduler type="default"> <argument name="properties"> <map> <map:entry key="jobsPerCpu" value="10"/> </map> </argument> <argument name="handlers"> <list> <task:handler type="execution" provider="gt2"/> <task:handler type="file" provider="gridftp"/> </list> </argument> <argument name="resources"> <resources> <host name="plussed"> <service type="execution" provider="gt2" url="plussed.mcs.anl.gov:4002"/> <service type="file" provider="gridftp" url="gridftp://plussed.mcs.anl.gov:4001"/> </host> </resources> </argument> </scheduler> </karajan>
